Package Game

Class Variant

java.lang.Object
Game.Variant
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoubleBonus10and7
public abstract class Variant extends Object
Description: Abstract class for video poker game variant's implementation.

Name: Variant.java

Version:
20/06/2022
Author:
Afonso Alemão, Rui Daniel, Tomás Fonseca

      public abstract boolean bet(char state, int b, boolean print)
      Description: Abstract method to run bet command.
      Parameters:
      state - (char) - current state
      b - (int) - amount player want to bet
      print - (boolean) - control the terminal output of this command
      Returns:

      keep - (List<Integer>) - list of cards to hold
      bet - (int) - how much the player bet

      boolean
